tasks.task: Load a hay wagon onto a truck
subtasks: Lift the wagon onto the truck bed
Secure the wagon on the truck using ties

tasks.task: Drive the truck to the desired location
subtasks: Position the truck next to the hay stack
Maneuver the truck to align the wagon with the hay stack
Untie the wagon from the truck
Lower the wagon onto the ground
Lift the hay bales from the wagon
Carry the hay bales to the hay stack
Place the hay bales onto the existing stack

tasks.task: Return the wagon to the hay field
subtasks: Haul the empty wagon back to the field
Park the truck in an available spot
Secure the wagon in place for the next use
